entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
